name: Battle For The Sun
wikiSummary: "Battle for the Sun" is a song from the album Battle for the Sun by the alternative rock band Placebo. Drummer Steve Forrest told Click Music: "It's the idea that if you love something, it's worth fighting for." (Source Battle For The Sun Songfacts). The title track debuted on Zane Lowe's BBC Radio 1 show at 19:30 GMT on March 17, 2009. After the world première, it became available for free download on the band's official site.
